a.span: Blind Brook - Rye Union Free School District

p.span: It is important that we show our support to those who have been risking their lives. If you would like to donate either supplies or money to area hospitals, please see the information below.
NYMC is in need of all PPE: masks(N95, surgical procedural), gloves, goggles, sanitizer, etc. If you'd like to drop of your donations in person:

span.strong: Kensico Dam Plaza, 1 Bronx River Pkwy Rd., Valhalla

p.span: If you have donations to be picked up, please contact:
If you'd like to drop of your donations in person, you can at any of our three sites below. Limited to 2 boxes only.

br.span: Adjacent to ED entrance outside of East Campus Station Rd. and 4th Ave.

strong.u: Otherwise, you can mail your donations to our Winthrop warehouse:

br.span: 250 Fulton Ave, New Hyde Park, NY 11040

em.strong: Montefiore Medical Center/ Albert Einstein College of Medicine

p.span: Montefiore has created a donation page for financial donations.

Westchester Medical Center is in need of N95 masks, surgical masks, face shields and goggles, fluid resistant gowns, non latex gloves. The items should not be delivered directly to the hospital. Please contact the hospital at supplies@wmchealth.org
Please contact De. Erika Abramson at erikaabramson@yahoo.com if you wish to make a donation.
Greenwich Hospital has created a donation page for financial donations.
White Plains hospital has asked people to call 914-849-GIVE or email wphcmail@wphospital.org if they are interested in donating supplies.

div.div:
390 North Ridge Street • Rye Brook, NY 10573
Phone: 914-937-3600 • Fax: 914-937-5871
